item.title: Artificial Intelligence on Health care
item.author: juby@bcinnovationlabs.com (Juby Varughese)
item.description: Well, before jumping into the actual topic we should understand what an AI is and we’re going to see that next. What is Artificial Intelligence ? Artificial Intelligence is the technology that is developed on stimulating human intelligence on smart machines or robots which are programmatically capable of replicating human actions and interactions. Ideally, it is based on the principle that human intelligence can be defined in a way that a machine can easily adapt, replicate it and execute tasks, from the most simple to those that are even more complex.
